attributes.action: Boycott the Tories at next Election if Donald Trump is given a state visit.
attributes.additional_details: This Conservative Government should stand up against such a person and the things he does and says by refusing him a state visit. He is simply not worthy.
attributes.background: Donald Trump is a misogynist, a sexist, a bully, a hypocrit and pathological liar. He is not deserving of a State Visit and the majority of the UK population abhor his policies, the way he speaks, the things he says and his complete disregard for the moral standards that the UK holds dear.

rejection.details: This petition calls on the voting public, not the Government or Parliament, to take action. You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/171928
